section.title: <meta>
section.para: The meta tag contains information about your Desklet shown in the shell.

row.entry: The name of the person(s) who wrote the desklet.
The category in which the desklet should be.
The person or group to whom the copyright is assigned.
The minimum version of gDesklets on which the desklet is dependent.
A short description of the desklet.
The name or comma-seperated list of names of licenses under which the desklet is provided.
Path to an image representing the display. This could be an icon or an actual screenshot, for example.

section.programlisting:
<display>
<meta name="MyFirstDesklet" version="0.1" category="misc/utilities" description="A display to show off my Python-writing skills." author="George D. Esklet" dependency="0.36.3" website="http://www.gdesklets.com" license="GPL-2" copyright="(C) 2010-2011 George D. Esklet" preview="gfx/icon.png"/>
</display>

warning.para: The meta tag name should start with a letter or a number!

note.para: Please provide all metadata, even some may be left empty.
